argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | unitinvcl.1 | |- U = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 2 |  | unitinvcl.2 | |- I = ( invr ` R ) |
| 3 |  | unitinvcl.3 | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 4 |  | unitinvcl.4 | |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_unitgrp | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) e. Grp ) |
| 7 | 1, 5 | #P_unitgrpbas | |- U = ( Base ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Unit ` R ) e. _V |
| 9 | 1, 8 | #P_eqeltri | |- U e. _V |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` R ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 11 | 10, 3 | #P_mgpplusg | |- .x. = ( +g ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 12 | 5, 11 | #P_ressplusg | |- ( U e. _V -> .x. = ( +g ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) ) ) |
| 13 | 9, 12 | #P_ax-mp | |- .x. = ( +g ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) ) = ( 0g ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 5, 2 | #P_invrfval | |- I = ( invg ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) ) |
| 16 | 7, 13, 14, 15 | #P_grprinv | |- ( ( ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) e. Grp /\ X e. U ) -> ( X .x. ( I ` X ) ) = ( 0g ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) ) ) |
| 17 | 6, 16 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. U ) -> ( X .x. ( I ` X ) ) = ( 0g ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) ) ) |
| 18 | 1, 5, 4 | #P_unitgrpid | |- ( R e. Ring -> .1. = ( 0g ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. U ) -> .1. = ( 0g ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) ) ) |
| 20 | 17, 19 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. U ) -> ( X .x. ( I ` X ) ) = .1. ) |
